genome_assembly.title: Genome assembly
genome_assembly.description: Identifier for the genome assembly used to call the allele.

pos.title: Reference position
pos.description: The reference position, with the 1st base having position 1.

id.title: Identifier(s)
id.description: Semicolon-separated list of unique identifiers where available. If this is a dbSNP variant their number(s) should be used.

qual.title: Quality
qual.description: Phred-scaled quality score for the assertion made in ALT.

filter.title: Filter status
filter.description: PASS if this position has passed all filters.

info.title: Additional information
info.description: Semicolon-separated series of additional information fields
